TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlMeta extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

summary.span: 允许以编程方式访问服务器上的 HTML 标记。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML tag on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件提供对服务器上的 HTML ``元素的编程访问。 The control provides programmatic access to the HTML `` element on the server. HTML ``元素是有关呈现的页的数据的容器, 但不是页内容本身。The HTML `` element is a container for data about the rendered page, but not page content itself. 标记放置在开始和关闭 HTML ``元素之间。 ``The `` tag is placed between the opening and closing HTML `` elements. 每``个元素都描述了元数据属性名称及其关联值。Each `` element describes a metadata property name and its associated value. 使用控件的属性来指定元数据属性名称, 并使用属性指定元数据属性值。 Use the control's property to specify the metadata property name, and the property to specify the metadata property value. 使用属性为用户代理指定有关如何解释元数据属性的其他信息。Use the property to specify additional information to user agents on how to interpret the metadata property. 当使用 HTTP 检索生成的元数据属性时, 请使用属性来代替属性。Use the property in place of the property when the resulting metadata property will be retrieved using HTTP. 可以使用`` 对象的属性获取对 page 元素的引用。You can get a reference to the page `` element using the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件为网页定义 HTML ``元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 定义``了两个元素, 一个列表关键字用于描述页面, 另一个列出创建页面的日期。Two `` elements are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化控件的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Meta" 文本字符串。The "meta" literal string.| ## Examples 有关如何使用构造函数的示例, 请参阅类概述主题。For an example of how to use the constructor, see the class overview topic.

.property instance string Content
Public Overridable Property Content As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Content { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Content : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 控件定义的元数据属性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the metadata property value defined by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与属性一起定义页的元数据属性。The property, together with the property, defines a metadata property of the page. 属性呈现为生成的 HTML `content` ``元素的特性。 The property is rendered to the `content` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件为网页定义 HTML ``元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 定义``了两个元素, 一个列表关键字用于描述页面, 另一个列出创建页面的日期。Two `` elements are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. 属性用于定义每个``标记的属性。`content` The property is used to define the `content` attribute for each `` tag. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 HTTP 响应标头中包含的 控件属性。

span.span: Gets or sets an control property that is included in the HTTP response header.

value.span: HTTP 响应标头项的名称。

span.span: The name of the HTTP response header item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性代替属性来标识应包含在 HTTP 请求的响应标头中的信息。 Use the property in place of the property to identify information that should be included in the response headers of an HTTP request. 属性呈现为生成的 HTML `http-equiv` ``元素的特性。 The property is rendered to the `http-equiv` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element.

summary.span: 获取或设置由 控件定义的元数据属性名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the metadata property name defined by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与属性一起定义页的元数据属性。The property, together with the property, defines a metadata property of the page. 属性呈现为生成的 HTML `name` ``元素的特性。 The property is rendered to the `name` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件为网页定义 HTML ``元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 定义``了两个标记, 一个列表关键字用于描述页面, 另一个列出创建页面的日期。Two `` tags are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. 属性用于定义每个``标记的属性。`name` The property is used to define the `name` attribute of each `` tag. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

override this.Render : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter -> unit

param.name: writer
param.span: 用于在客户端浏览器上呈现 控件的内容。

span.span: The used to render the control's content on the client's browser.

summary.span: 使用指定的 对象将 控件呈现给客户端浏览器。

span.span: Renders the control to the client's browser using the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端的浏览器符合 XHTML, ``控件将在元素上呈现 HTML 方括号 (/>)。 The control renders a HTML bracket (/>) on the `` element if the client's browser is XHTML compliant. 有关为非 XHTML 呈现配置 ASP.NET 的详细信息, 请参阅[笔尖:如何：在 ASP.NET 网站](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149)中配置 XHTML 呈现。For more information on configuring ASP.NET for non-XHTML rendering, see [NIB: How to: Configure XHTML Rendering in ASP.NET Web Sites](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149).

para.span: 扩展控件时, 重写方法以提供自定义呈现。

span.span: When extending the control, override the method to provide custom rendering.

related.span: ASP.NET 和 XHTML 遵从性

.property instance string Scheme
Public Overridable Property Scheme As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Scheme { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Scheme : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 特性，该特性用于解释由 控件定义的元数据属性值。

span.span: Gets or sets a attribute used to interpret the metadata property value defined by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您`scheme`指定呈现的 HTML ``元素的特性。 The property allows you to specify a `scheme` attribute of the rendered HTML `` element. `scheme`特性可用于提供用户代理, 如客户端浏览器或搜索引擎, 以及用于解释元数据属性的其他上下文。The `scheme` attribute can be used to provide user agents, such as client browsers or search engines, additional context for interpreting the metadata property. 属性呈现为生成的 HTML `scheme` ``元素的特性。 The property is rendered to the `scheme` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件为网页定义 HTML ``元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 定义``了两个标记, 一个列表关键字用于描述页面, 另一个列出创建页面的日期。Two `` tags are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. 属性用于与日期相关``的标记, 以帮助用户代理读取日期值。 The property is used for the date-related `` tag to aid user agents reading the date value. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
